name: Dodge Master
description: Dodge Master is a high speed test of reflexes that will challenge your dodging ability throughout the experience. You play as a white block that you must guide through a series of levels that will really test your hand-eye coordination skills.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB graphics Storage: 20 MB available space
